abstract: MidAmerican Energy Holdings, part of the Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate controlled by Warren Buffett, agreed to buy Nevada’s largest electric utility, NV Energy.
snippet: MidAmerican Energy Holdings, part of the Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate controlled by Warren Buffett, agreed to buy Nevada’s largest electric utility, NV Energy.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett dived back into the acquisition pool on Wednesday with a large bet in the energy sector. MidAmerican Energy Holdings, a unit of Mr. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, agreed to buy Nevada’s largest electric utility, NV Energy, for about $5.6 billion.

headline.main: Berkshire Unit in $5.6 Billion Deal for Nevada’s Largest Electric Utility
